div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: Google Classroom Codes and How to Join

div.p: Teachers, students, and parents will find all of the various district google classroom codes so you can easily join.
Method 1: contact the teacher through email and asking what the code is
Method 2: get invited by the teacher via email.
Step 3: Click on the + sign in the top right.
Step 5: Type in the class code.

div.a: New Jersey Department of Health COVID-19 Hotline: 800-222-1222

div.p: The New Jersey Department of Health announced the opening of a hotline (1-800-222-1222 or 1-800-962-1253 if using out-of-state phone line) for the public to ask questions about the 2019 Novel Coronavirus.
